items.sentence: I really appreciate you letting me use your apartment.
I don't think this is an unreasonable request to make.
I got this information second hand, so I may be wrong.
What makes you think Tom would do something like that?
You have to hustle if you want to get on in the world.
Tom wanted to know exactly what he was supposed to do.
The post office is down the street. You can't miss it.
Where are you planning to stay while you're in Boston?
How often do you think you'll go swimming next summer?
I don't know about you, but I think we should do that.
